summary:
What exactly is a Mainnet? An Airdrop? - Cryptocurrency and blockchain terminology gets thrown around by so many different people in conversation without everyone really understanding what they are saying. Eric takes a look at what is a mainnet, and what exactly is an airdrop so you can make better blockchain and cryptocurrency choices.

 Five Things the Crypto World Needs NOW - The cryptocurrency world is one full of innovation, creativity, new outstanding technology. Here are five things that it needs to have to make all of our lives and cryptocurrency investments easier.

 Five Types Of Crypto Investors - 

 The False Hope of The Bitcoin Success Stories -
